intro: Dipsacus lijigensis, commonly known as the Lijigeng thorn. It is a flowering plant native to China, belonging to the family Caprifoliaceae. The plant is characterized by its spiny stems and clusters of small, pinkish-white flowers. It typically grows in rocky or dry habitats, showcasing its adaptability to harsh environments. Its botanical features make it a subject of interest in both horticulture and ecological studies.
